channel.title: CVE Feed for pjgalbraith -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for pjgalbraith -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-6161|2024-07-15T21:11:46.738Z -- pjgalbraith -- default%20thumbnail%20plus
item.description: The Default Thumbnail Plus plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary file uploads due to missing file type validation in the 'get_cache_image' function in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.2.3. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level and above permissions, to upload arbitrary files on the affected site's server which may make remote code execution possible.

item.title: CVE-2024-6161|2024-07-09T07:38:29.100Z -- pjgalbraith -- default%20thumbnail%20plus
item.description: The Default Thumbnail Plus plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary file uploads due to missing file type validation in the 'get_cache_image' function in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.2.3. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level and above permissions, to upload arbitrary files on the affected site's server which may make remote code execution possible.
